śliṣṭaiḥ artha bhedena śabda bhedaḥ iti darśanāt

original: “kāvyamārge svaro na gaṇyate” iti ca nayāt vācyabhedena bhinnairapi yugapaduccāraṇenāpagatabhedaiḥ /
analyzed: kāvya mārge svaraḥ na gaṇyate iti ca nayāt vācya bhedena bhinnaiḥ api yugapad uccāraṇena apagata bhedaiḥ

original: tridhā khalu śabdābhivyaktiḥ rūpator'thataḥ svarataśceti darśanāt /
analyzed: tridhā khalu śabda abhivyaktiḥ rūpataḥ ṛthataḥ svarataḥ ca iti darśanāt

original: evaṃ ca bhinnayorapi samānaśrutyoḥ śabdayostattannyāyena uccaritayoḥ kameṇa svasyārthabodhanaṃ yatra tatra śabdasvarūpaśleṣeṇa śabdaśleṣaḥ
analyzed: evam ca bhinnayoḥ api samāna śrutyoḥ śabdayoḥ tad tad nyāyena uccaritayoḥ kameṇa svasya artha bodhanam yatra tatra śabda svarūpa śleṣeṇa śabda śleṣaḥ

original: śabdaparivṛttisahatve tvarthaśleṣa iti niyamamaṅgīkurvatāṃ kāvyaprakāśakārādīnāṃ matamanusṛtya vyākhyānam /
analyzed: śabda parivṛtti saha tve tu artha śleṣaḥ iti niyamam aṅgīkurvatām kāvyaprakāśa kāra ādīnām matam anusṛtya vyākhyānam

original: anye tvāhuḥ--na khalu ghaṭapaṭayoriva “vasudhāmahita purājita nirāgamanābhāvāḥ /
analyzed: anye tu āhuḥ na khalu ghaṭa paṭayoḥ iva vasudhā mahita purājita nirāgamana abhāvāḥ
varṣāḥ ca a surabhita varāha vapuṣaḥ tarve ca hareḥ ca upamā ghaṭatā
ityādau śabdānām eka prayatnena niṣpatti dvayam upapadyate

eka ākāram gha ca śatam ekayā sāmagyā niṣpādayet
tathā sati bheda vyavahāra ucchedaḥ syāt
ayam eva bhedaḥ bheda hetuḥ ca yat viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaḥ ca iti

original: kiṃ ca yadyubhayārthapratipādanasamīhayā vakturekadā śabdadvayodāharaṇasambhavastadā ghaṭasahastracikīrṣuḥ kulālo 'pi ekadā tat nirvāhayet
analyzed: kim ca yadi ubhaya artha pratipādana samīhayā vaktuḥ ekadā śabda dvaya udāharaṇa sambhavaḥ tadā ghaṭa sahastra cikīrṣuḥ kulālaḥ pi ekadā tat nirvāhayet
tat uktam ācārya śrīmat udyota kara caraṇaiḥ krama vṛtti tvāt vācaḥ iti

original: tenaikatraiva śabde nānāviṣayāṇāmarthānāṃ svaṃsvasāmagrīvaśena kameṇojjīvanamiti vādināṃ matamevāśrayitumucitam /
analyzed: tena ekatra eva śabde nānā viṣayāṇām arthānām svam sva sāmagrī vaśena kameṇa ujjīvanam iti vādinām matam evā āśrayitum ucitam

original: kintvatra mate tatprathamaviruddhāyā dvitīyābhidhāyāḥ punarujjīvanamanupapannamiti dvitīyābhidhānāmnā“janasthāne bhrānta” mityādāvivātrāpi  #
analyzed: kintu atra mate tad prathama viruddhāyāḥ dvitīya abhidhāyāḥ punar ujjīvanam anupapannam iti dvitīya abhidhā nāmnā janasthāne bhrāntam mityādau iva atra api
vyañjanā eva vṛttiḥ upadiśyate

original: evaṃ ca dhvanitantre prakaraṇaniyamasthale tasmādeva śabdāduccāraṇādisāmagrīsahakṛtā tadvyāpārantareṇa sabhaṅgābhaṅgaśabdāntaralabhyārthapratītiḥ
analyzed: evam ca dhvani tantre prakaraṇa niyama sthale tasmāt eva śabdāt uccāraṇa ādi sāmagrī sahakṛtā tad vyāpāra antareṇa sa bhaṅga abhaṅga śabda antara labhya artha pratītiḥ

original: yatra tu yena dhvastetyādau prakaraṇādiniyamo nāsti tatra dvayorabhidhānasaṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: yatra tu yena dhvastā ityādau prakaraṇa ādi niyamaḥ na asti tatra dvayoḥ abhidhāna saṃśayaḥ

original: yatra ca śabdaparivartane 'pi dvyarthahānistatra śabdaśaktermūlatvena śabdaśleṣaḥ /

original: “hṛdijñeṣu ca vakṣyati” ityādau “vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinībhṛtām“ityādau ca yasyārthasya prathamaṃ buddhyārohastasyopameyatā,

anyasya ca upamāna tā iti saṃgatiḥ

original: (lo, i) iha ca varṇādigatatvena aṣṭavidhatvaṃ śleṣasyāsamīcīnamiti caṇḍīdāsapaṇḍitarāghavānandaprabhṛtīnāṃ matam /

original: “yena dhvastamanobhavena” ityādau “syānnanditā virūpākṣapādapadmaniṣevaṇāt” ityādau ca prakaraṇājñāne kimahaṃ nanditānandakaḥ syāmiti kasyacid  #

original: “sarvasvaṃ hara sarvasva” ityatrāpi vakṣyamāṇodāharaṇer'thadvayasyāpi sandehāspadatvād vibhaktiśleṣaḥ /

original: “dadhate 'sya parāṃ śobhāmaho madhuratābhṛtaḥ” ityādau ca kiṃ madhuratāṃ bibhratīti madhuratābhṛto bahavo janāḥ,
analyzed: dadhate sya parām śobhām ahar madhura tā bhṛtaḥ ityādau ca kim madhura tām bibhrati iti madhura tā bhṛtaḥ bahavaḥ janāḥ

original: uta madhuratayā bhṛtaḥ kaścid varttata iti bahuvacanaikavacanayoḥ śleṣaḥ /
analyzed: uta madhura tayā bhṛtaḥ kaścid varttate iti bahuvacana ekavacanayoḥ śleṣaḥ
kiñca madhura tā bhṛtaḥ iti atra api kkip pratyaya kta pratyayayoḥ

original: dadhata ityatrāpi ca pakṣe dhādhātorbahuvacanaṃ pakṣe ca dadhadhātorekavacanaṃ śliṣṭaṃ ca /

atra tritaya sattvam darśayati atra iti
ekaika śloke ekaika ā pradarśanasya bījam āha grantha iti
locanā
laḥ a hara pakṣe manobhavaḥ kāmaḥ
balijit viṣṇuḥ
tasya kāyaḥ purā daitya artham astrī kṛtaḥ

original: udvṛttā ativarttulākārā bhujaṅgā eva hārā valayāśca yasya /
analyzed: udvṛttāḥ ati varttula ākārāḥ bhujaṅgāḥ eva hārāḥ valayāḥ ca yasya
gaṅgām tripathagām
śaśī vidyate yatra tat śaśimat
andhaka daityasya kṣayaḥ nāśaḥ
hari pakṣeyena anaḥ śakaṭam dhvastam
abhavena cit rūpeṇa

original: ātmana eva kāyaḥ purā pūrvam amṛtāharaṇakāle 'suramohanārthaṃ strīrūpaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ eva kāyaḥ purā pūrvam amṛta āharaṇa kāle sura mohana artham strī rūpaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: udvṛttaḥ uddhato bhujaṅgaḥ kāliyaḥ taṃ hantīti /
analyzed: udvṛttaḥ uddhataḥ bhujaṅgaḥ kāliyaḥ tam hanti iti
rave nāda rūpe brahmaṇi layaḥ yasya

original: agaṃ parvataṃ govarddhanākhyaṃ gāṃ pṛthvīṃ ca /
analyzed: agam parvatam govarddhana ākhyam gām pṛthvīm ca

original: śasinaṃ mathnāti iti śaśimadrāhuḥ tasya śiroharaḥ /
analyzed: śasinam mathnāti iti śaśimat rāhuḥ tasya śiraḥ haraḥ

original: andhakānām andhakavaṃśīyānāṃ kṣayo nivāso dvārakāpurasambhandhī tatkaraḥ /
analyzed: andhakānām andhaka vaṃśīyānām kṣayaḥ nivāsaḥ dvārakā pura sambhandhī tad karaḥ
sarvam dadāti iti sarva daḥ
mādhavaḥ śrīpatiḥ
sa bhaṅgaḥ pada bhaṅge artha pratyayāt
anayoḥ sa bhaṅga abhaṅga rūpayoḥ śleṣayoḥ ekaśloke
iha kecid āhuḥ sa bhaṅga śleṣaḥ eva śabda śleṣa viṣayaḥ
yatra udātta ādi svara bhedāt bhinna prayatna uccārya tvena bhinnayoḥ śabdayoḥ jatu kāṣṭha nyāyena śleṣaḥ
locanā
ā samprati sa bhaṅgaḥ eva śabda śleṣa viṣayaḥ
abhaṅgaḥ tu artha śleṣaḥ iti svīkurvatām pakṣam anūdya dūṣayati iha ityādi
āhuḥ iti asya dūra sthena upapatteḥ iti iti śabdena anvayaḥ
sabhaṅgaḥ varṇavyūheṣu bhaṅgena yutaḥ
tad bhāva ātmakena bhinna padena vā sahitaḥ
śabda śleṣa viṣayaḥ śabda dvaidha bhinna nirvyūḍha artha dvaividhyāt iti arthaḥ
udātta ādi iti uccais udāttaḥ
na uccais anudāttaḥ
ādi śabdāt tad antargatānām anunāsikā ādīnām kāku bhedānām ca upasaṅgrahaḥ
bhinna prayatna uccāryya tvena prayatna bhedena uccāraṇam vinā udātta di bheda abhāvāt
etena tad kāryyeṇa atibhedaḥ ca abhipretaḥ

original: yathā-- “sārasavattā vihatā na bakā vilasanti carati no kaṅkaḥ /
analyzed: yathā sārasa vattāḥ vihatāḥ na bakāḥ vilasanti carati no kaṅkaḥ
sarasi iva kīrtti śeṣam gatavati bhuvi vikama āditye

original: iti atra hi rājapakṣe sā, iti, kam iti /
analyzed: iti atra hi rāja pakṣe sā iti kam iti

original: saraḥ pakṣe netītyatra tu sā nāsti /
analyzed: saraḥ pakṣe na iti iti atra tu sā na asti
jatu kāṣṭha nyāyena iti

original: yathā kāṣṭhayorbhinnayorapyupāyavaśena jaḍīkṛtayorekatā tathābhinnayoḥ padayoḥ śabdayorekatra varṇavyūhe sanniveśaḥ /
analyzed: yathā kāṣṭhayoḥ bhinnayoḥ api upāya vaśena jaḍīkṛtayoḥ ekatā tathā abhinnayoḥ padayoḥ śabdayoḥ ekatra varṇa vyūhe sanniveśaḥ
abhaṅgaḥ tu artha śleṣaḥ eva
yatra svara abhedāt abhinna prayatna uccārya tayā śabda abhedāt arthayoḥ eka vṛnta gata phala dvaya nyāyena śleṣaḥ
locanā
artha śleṣaḥ eva śabda svarūpa viparyāsa abhāve pi arthasya dvidhā ātmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ
yatra iti

original: yathā ekasminneva vṛnte phaladvayaṃ tathā ekasminneva śabder'thadvayasaṃsargaḥ /
analyzed: yathā ekasmin eva vṛnte phala dvayam tathā ekasmin eva śabdeḥ ṛtha dvaya saṃsargaḥ

original: yo hi yadāśritaḥ sa tadalaṅkāra eva /
analyzed: yaḥ hi yad āśritaḥ sa tad alaṅkāraḥ eva
alaṅkārya alaṅkāraṇa bhāvasya loka vat āśraya āśrayi bhāvena upapattiḥ iti
vijña priyā
na sa bhaṅga tve śabda śleṣa tva bījam āha yatra iti
sa bhaṅga śleṣa sthale kāvye svarabheda gaṇanam iti tad matam
tatas ca bhinna prayatna uccāryya tvena eva pṛthak pṛthak śabda bhedaḥ

original: kevalaṃ vibhinnatvena pratīyamānayorapi atyantasannidhānarūpa eva jatukāṣṭhayoriva śleṣa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kevalam vibhinna tvena pratīyamānayoḥ api atyanta sannidhāna rūpaḥ eva jatu kāṣṭhayoḥ iva śleṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
abhaṅga śleṣaḥ tu artha śleṣaḥ iti āha abhaṅgaḥ tu iti
tad artha śleṣa tve bījam āha yatra iti
abhinna prayatna uccāryya tvena śabda bheda abhāvāt eka vṛnta lagna phala dvaya vat eka śabda lagna arthayoḥ eva śliṣṭa tvam iti arthaḥ

original: tāvataiva kathamarthālaṅkāratvam ityatrāha---yo hi yadāśraya iti /
analyzed: tāvatā eva katham artha alaṅkāra tvam iti atra āhayaḥ hi yad āśrayaḥ iti
sa bhaṅga tve śabdayoḥ eva śliṣṭa tvāt tatra śleṣaḥ śabda āśritaḥ
eka deśa āśrityoḥ arthayoḥ eva ca śliṣṭa tvāt artha āśritaḥ tatra śleṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
locanā
yaḥ hi iti

original: yathā loke bhujāśrito bhujasthālaṅkāraḥ kaṇṭhaśritaḥ kaṇṭhasya tathāsau śabdāśrita iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yathā loke bhuja āśritaḥ bhuja stha alaṅkāraḥ kaṇṭha śritaḥ kaṇṭhasya tathā asau śabda āśritaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
loka vat iti
loke āśraya āśrayi bhāvena eva vyapadeśaḥ
yathā rāja puruṣaḥ
yat vā upapatteḥ upādānāt vyavaharaṇāt iti yāvat
tad anye na kṣamante

original: tathāhi--atra dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyadoṣaguṇālaṅkārāṇāṃ śabdārthagatatvena vyavasthiteranvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvena niyam iti /
analyzed: tathā hi atra dhvani guṇībhūta vyaṅgya doṣa guṇa alaṅkārāṇām śabda artha gata tvena vyavasthiteḥ anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvena iti
vijña priyā
vi pa tad anye iti
kāvya prakāśa kāra ādayaḥ tad anuyāyinaḥ vayañca iti arthaḥ
tathā hi atra iti
atra alaṅkāra śāstre śabda śakti mūla vyaṅgya tve dhvani guṇībhūta vyaṅgyayoḥ śabda gata tva vyavahāraḥ

original: arthaśaktimūlatve tu arthagatatvena doṣādīnāṃ tu śabdārthanvayādyavidhānaṃ sphuṭameva /
analyzed: artha śakti mūla tve tu artha gata tvena doṣa ādīnām tu śabda artha nvaya ādya vidhānam sphuṭam eva

original: tathā ca nānārthābhaṅgaśabdasyāpi śleṣeṇānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāta tatrāpi śabdaśleṣatvameva iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca nānārtha abhaṅga śabdasya api śleṣeṇa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt tatra api śabda śleṣa tvam eva iti bhāvaḥ
locanā
siddhāntam āha tat ukta prakāram pūrveṣām matam
anye bhiyuktāḥ na manyante na svīkurvanti
kutas na manyante tatra hetum āha tathā hi iti

original: atra alaṅkāraprastāve yeṣāṃ dvandvārthānāṃ śabdānāṃ paryyāntareṇa pratipādane 'pi na kṣatista evārthagatāḥ /
analyzed: atra alaṅkāra prastāve yeṣām dvandva arthānām śabdānām na kṣatiḥ te eva artha gatāḥ

original: yeṣāṃna tu tathā te śabdagatā eveti niyamanāt prācīnairalaṅkārakārairiti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām na tu tathā te śabda gatāḥ eva iti niyamanāt prācīnaiḥ alaṅkāra kāraiḥ iti śeṣaḥ
na ca andhaka kṣaye ityādau śabda abhedaḥ
artha bhedena śabda bhedaḥ iti darśanāt
vijña priyā

original: (vi, pha) mataviśeṣe tu yatra nānārthasthale 'pi śabdabhedastathā ca tatrāpi śliṣṭānekaśabdakṛtaḥ śabdālaṅkārastanmate nirbādha eveti tanmataṃ  #
analyzed: mata viśeṣe tu yatra nānā artha sthale śabda bhedaḥ tathā ca tatra api śliṣṭa aneka śabda kṛtaḥ śabdālaṅkāraḥ tad mate nirbādhaḥ eva iti tad matam
darśayati na ca andhakaḥ iti
na ca śabda abhedaḥ iti anvayaḥ
tatra hetum āha artha bhedena iti
ghaṭa paṭa rūpa artha bhedena ghaṭa paṭa śabda bhedanāt iti arthaḥ
tathā ca etat dṛṣṭāntena eva artha bhedasya śabda bheda vyāpya tva siddhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: na ca tatkathaṃ nānārthakaśabdāḥ śrūyante iti vācyam--ekaprayatnoccāryyatvadoṣeṇa bhedāgrahāt /
analyzed: na ca tat katham nānārthaka śabdāḥ śrūyante iti vācyam eka prayatna uccāryya tva doṣeṇa bheda agrahāt
locanā
na ca tad niyamana mātreṇa abhaṅgasya śabda śleṣa tvam
śabda bhedāt api iti āha na ca iti
hetum āha artha bhedena iti
darśanāt yuṣmābhiḥ eva siddhāntāt pramāṇīkṛtāt iti śeṣaḥ
kim ca atra śabdasya eva mukhya tayā vaicitrya bodha upāya tvena kavi pratibhayā uṭṭaṅkanāt śabdālaṅkāra tvam eva

original: visadṛśaśabdadvayasya bandhe cevaṃvidhasya vaicitryābhāvād vaicitryasyaiva cālaṅkāratvāt /
analyzed: visadṛśa śabda dvayasya bandhe ca ivaṃvidhasya vaicitrya abhāvāt vaicitryasya eva ca alaṅkāra tvāt
artha mukha prekṣi tayā ca artha alaṅkāra tve nuprāsa ādīnām api rasa ādi para tvena artha mukha prekṣi tayā artha alaṅkāra tva prasaṅgaḥ
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ba) nanu sabhaṅgaśleṣasthaler'thabhedāt tvadabhimatasvarabhedadṛṣṭāntena abhaṅgānekaśabdānāmarthabhedāt svarabheda eva syāt /
analyzed: vi ba nanu sa bhaṅga śleṣa sthala ṛtha bhedāt tvad abhimata svara bheda dṛṣṭāntena abhaṅga aneka śabdānām artha bhedāt svarabhedaḥ eva syāt

original: tathā ca svarabhedavailakṣaṇyagrahe kathaṃ bhedagrahaḥ syādator'thabhedasya śabdabhedavyāptiraprayojikaiva ityata ekaprayatnena nānāśabdoccāraṇamityata  #
analyzed: tathā ca svara bheda vailakṣaṇya grahe katham bheda grahaḥ syāt atas ṛtha bhedasya śabda bheda vyāptiḥ aprayojikā eva iti atas eka prayatnena nānā śabda uccāraṇam iti atas
āha kiñca iti
śabdasya eva mukhya tayā vaicitrya upāya tvena kavi pratibhayā uṭṭaṅkanāt viṣayīkāraṇāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanu andhakādyakhaṇḍaśabdasya mukhyatve kiṃ pramāṇamityata āhavisadṛśaśabdadvayasyeti /
analyzed: nanu andhaka ādi akhaṇḍa śabdasya mukhya tve kim pramāṇam iti atas āha visadṛśa śabda dvayasya iti

original: nahi hariṇaśabdasthale tadarthakendrādiśabdaprayoge hari naumītyatreva viṣṇivandrau naumītyatrāpi śleṣarūpavaicitryānanubhava ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: nahi hariṇa śabda sthale tad arthaka indra ādi śabda prayoge hari naumi iti atra iva viṣṇi vandrau naumi iti atra api śleṣa rūpa vaicitrya ananubhavaḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu artha mukha prokṣi tvāt abhaṅga śleṣasya artha alaṅkāra tvam ucyate iti atas āha artha mukha iti
anupārasa ādīnām iti ādi padāt sa bhaṅga śleṣa vakra utti ādi parigrahaḥ
rasa ādi paratvena iti
rasa niṣṭa guṇa arthaka tvena eva rasa paratvam bodhyam
ādi padāt lāṭa anuprāse vācya artha mukha prekṣi tvam eva baudhyam
locanā

original: (lo, ṛ) ye 'pyāhuryo yadāśretaḥ sa tadalaṅkāra iti tanmate 'pyatra vaucitryasya śabdaniṣṭhatvācchabdālaṅkāratvamityāha---kiñceti /
analyzed: ye pi āhuḥ yaḥ yad āśretaḥ sa tad alaṅkāraḥ iti tad mate pi atra vaucitryasya śabda niṣṭha tvāt śabda alaṅkāra tvam iti āha kiñca iti
vaicitryam lokottara vicchittiḥ alaṅkāra rūpā
pratibhā nava nava unmeṣa śālinī prajñā
uṭṭaṅkanāt ullekhanāt
atra hetum āha visadṛśa iti
visadṛśam asamāna śrutikam
yathā andhaka kṣaya karaḥ iti atra kṣaya śabda sthāne vināśa nivāsa rūpaka śabda dvayam
asya ca vaicitryasya artha anusandhānam antareṇa anupalabdheḥ arthālaṅkāra tvam asti iti āśaṅkya āha artha iti
artha mukha prekṣi tvam artha anusāndhāne vaicitrya yogaḥ
tathā sati alaṅkāra antare tiprasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha anuprāsa ādīnām iti
ayam arthaḥ anuprāsa ādīnām api hi rasa ādi paratva abhāve vṛtti virodhāt

original: rasādirūpasyārthasya tadabhivayañjakasya vibhāvādirūpasyārthasya vānusandhānamastyeveti tepi kathaṃ śabdālaṅkāramadhye yuṣmābhirapi gaṇyanta  #
analyzed: rasa ādi rūpasya arthasya vibhāva ādi rūpasya arthasya vā anusandhānam asti eva iti te pi katham śabda alaṅkāra madhye yuṣmābhiḥ api
iti

original: śabdasyābhinnaprayatnoccāryatvenārthālaṅkāratve “pratikūlatāmupagate hi vidhau” ityādau śabdabhede 'pyarthālaṅkāratvaṃ tathāpi prasajyata ityubhayatrāpi  #
analyzed: śabdasya abhinna prayatna uccārya tvena artha alaṅkāra tve pratikūla tām upagate hi vidhau ityādau śabdabhede pi artha alaṅkāra tvam tathā api prasajyate iti ubhayatra api
śabda alaṅkāra tvam eva
vijña priyā

original: (vi, bha) abhinnaprayatnoccāryyatvenārthālaṅkāratvasya taduktasya śabdālaṅkāratayā nirvivāde varṇaśleṣavarṇānuprāse 'pi atiprasāktimāha---pratikūlaṃtamiti
analyzed: abhinna prayatna uccāryya tvena artha alaṅkāra tvasya tad uktasya śabda alaṅkāra tayā nirvivāde varṇa śleṣa varṇa anuprāse ati prasāktim āha pratikūlaṃtam iti
ubhayatra api iti
sa bhaṅga bhaṅgayoḥ iti arthaḥ
locanā
yat punar uktam śabdasya eka prayatna uccāryya tva īrtha alaṅkāra tvam iti tathā api avyāpti doṣaḥ iti āha śabdasya iti
pratikūla tām ityādau vidhau iti atra ikāra ukārayoḥ aukāra rūpa tvena abhinna prayatna uccāryya tvam tat śabdabhedena śabda śleṣam aṅgīkurvataḥ
ubhayatra yena dhvasta etyādau andhaka kṣayaḥ ityādau ca

original: yatra tu śabdaparivarttane 'pi na śleṣatvakhaṇḍanā, tatra--
analyzed: yatra tu śabda parivarttane na śleṣa tva khaṇḍanā tatra
stokena unnatim āyāti stokena āyāti adhogatim
aho su sadṛśī vṛttiḥ tulā koṭeḥ khalasya ca
ityādau artha śleṣaḥ
vijña priyā
vi ma nanu evam artha sleṣa alaṅkāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha yatra tu iti
tam eva viṣayam āha tatra stokena iti

original: aho tulāyā mānatulāyāḥ koṭeragrabhāgasya khalasya ca susadṛśī vṛttiryataḥ stokenetyādi /
analyzed: aho tulāyāḥ māna tulāyāḥ koṭeḥ agra bhāgasya khalasya ca su sadṛśī vṛttiḥ yatas stokena ityādi
stokena guñjā ādi alpa vastunā
pakṣe stokena alpa praśaṃsanena alpa nindanena ca
atra unnati adhogati arthaka pada antara dāne pi nā artha śleṣa tva khaṇḍanā
locanā

original: (lo, ḷ) tat kva nu punararthaśleṣa ityāha---yatra hīti /
analyzed: tat kva nu punar artha śleṣaḥ iti āha yatra hi iti
śabdasya parivarttane paryyāya antareṇa pratipādane
atra stoka ādi syāne su alpa ādi pada niveśe na hi artha tā hāniḥ
asya ca alaṅkāra antara vivikta viṣaya tāyāḥ asambhavāt vidyamāneṣu alaṅkāra antareṣu apavāda tvena tad vādhaka tayā tad pratibhā utpatti hetutvam iti kecid
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ya) idānīṃ śleṣasya alaṅkārāntarāsaṅkīrṇaviṣayābhāvād alaṅkārāntarasya ca śleṣāsaṅkīrṇaviṣayasattvāt
analyzed: vi yaḥ idānīm śleṣasya alaṅkāra antara asaṅkīrṇa viṣaya abhāvāt alaṅkāra antarasya ca śleṣa asaṅkīrṇa viṣaya sattvāt

original: sāmānyamalaṅkārāntaramapavādatvena bādhitvā śleṣa evālaṅkāraḥ alaṅkārāntaraṃ tu tat
analyzed: sāmānyam alaṅkāra antaram apavāda tvena bādhitvā śleṣaḥ eva alaṅkāraḥ alaṅkāra antaram tu tat
saṅkīrṇam tad grāhakam eva iti kecid āhuḥ
tad matam darśayati asya iti
tad pratibhā utpatti hetu tvam iti tad pratibhā

original: alaṅkārāntaraviṣayiṇī pratibhā tasyā evotpattihetutvamasya śleṣasya tadviṣayabodhakatvamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: alaṅkāra antara viṣayiṇī pratibhā tasyāḥ eva utpatti hetutvam asya śleṣasya tad viṣaya bodhaka tvam iti arthaḥ
śabda śleṣeṇa śleṣa alaṅkāra viṣaya pratibhā eva janyate iti arthaḥ
na tu alaṅkāra antara viṣaya pratibhā iti arthaḥ
tathā ca alaṅkāra antara saṃkare śleṣaḥ eva alaṅkāraḥ iti arthaḥ
locanā

original: (lo, e) eṣa ca niyamādalaṅkāraṇāṃ vicchittimādāyaiva sambhavatītyetadviṣaye vidyamānānāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ bādha iti ye manyante teṣāṃ pakṣamupanyasya  #
analyzed: eṣa ca niyamāt alaṅkāraṇām vicchittim ādāya eva sambhavati iti etad viṣaye vidyamānānām alaṅkāraṇām bādhaḥ iti ye manyante teṣām pakṣam upanyasya
dūṣayati asya ca iti
vidyamāneṣu etat viṣayeṣu
tad vādhaka tvāt

original: teṣāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ bādhakatvādavakāśāntarābhāvena tahyapadeśaṃ bādhitvā mukhyatvena vyapadeṣṭuṃ yogyatvāt /

vijña priyā

original: (vi, ra) tanmate 'pi sakalālaṅkārasaṃkare śleṣo na bādakaḥ,
analyzed: tad mate sakala alaṅkāra saṃkare śleṣaḥ na bādakaḥ

original: tatra samāsoktyaprastutapraśaṃsāsaṅkīrṇasya śleṣasya taddvayabādhakaprasaktireva nāsti ityāha---samāsektīti /
analyzed: tatra samāsokti aprastuta praśaṃsā saṅkīrṇasya śleṣasya tad dvaya bādhaka prasaktiḥ eva na asti iti āha samāsekti iti
prastuta kathanena aprastuta vyañjanam samāsoktiḥ
kvacid śleṣa saṅkīrṇā sā
yathā anurāgavatī sandhyā divasaḥ tat puras saraḥ
aho daiva gatiḥ citrā tathā api na samāgamaḥ
iti atra prakṛta divasa puraḥ sara sandhyā kathanāt aprakṛta nāyaka puraḥ sara nāyikā pratītau raktimān uraga ubhaya arthaka anurāga pada śleṣa saṃkaraḥ
aprastuta kathanena prastuta vyañjanam ca aprastuta praśaṃsā
sā ca kvacid ślṣa saṅkīrṇā api bhavati

original: yathā--- “satataṃ yā madhyasthā kathayati yaṣṭiḥ pratiṣṭitāsīti /
analyzed: yathā satatam yā madhyasthā kathayati yaṣṭiḥ pratiṣṭitā asi iti
puṣkariṇī nā eva tat ucitam pūrṇa āyattām adhas nayasi
iti atra janaiḥ yaṣṭi plāvana prākaraṇika puṣkariṇī kathanena prākaraṇika pratiṣṭā gāyaka jana tiraskāraka sampatti majjana pratītau madhyastha ādi pada śleṣa saṃkaraḥ
etat ubhayatra śleṣa alaṅkāra prasaktiḥ eva na asti iti atas āha na asya gandhaḥ pi iti
atra hetum āha dvitīya arthasya iti

original: “vidvanmānasahaṃsa--” ityādau śleṣagarbhe rūpake 'pi mānasaśabdasya cittasarorūpobhayārthatve 'pi rūpakeṇa śleṣo bādhyate /

original: viduṣāṃ mana eva mānasaṃ sarastatra haṃseti rājñaḥ sambodhanam /

original: yathā “pṛthukārttasvarapātram” ityatra sadanadvayaviśeṣaṇayoḥ śliṣṭārthayoḥ viśrāntistadāha---śleṣe hīti /

original: “sannihitabālāndhakārā bhāsvanmūrtiśca” ityādau virodhābhāse 'pi viruddhārthasya pratibhātamātrasya prarohābhāvānna śleṣaḥ /

vijña priyā
śliṣṭa virodha ābhāse pi na śleṣa alaṅkāra prasaktiḥ iti āha sannihita iti

atra bhāsvat mūrtteḥ sūryya vimbasya alpa andhakāra sānnidhyam bāla pada bhāsvat pada śleṣāt upasthitam viruddha tayā ābhāsate
atra śleṣa alaṅkāra aprasakti bījam āha viruddha arthasya iti
pratibhāta mātrasya upasthita mātrasya iti arthaḥ
praroha abhāvāt anvaya bodha abhāvāt
nahi andhakāra sannihita sūryya mūrttiḥ nāyikā na vā andhakāra sānnidhyam sūrya bimbasya

original: iti bādhasyāpi upasthitimātreṇa eva virodhābhāsālaṅkāratā śleṣasya tu śliṣṭārthasyānvaye

original: tathā ca śliṣṭapadārthānusandhānena sāmyapratītau tato 'ṅginyupamā pratīyate /

original: śleṣādestvarthānusādhānāt sāpekṣatvena parasparāpekṣāsambhavāt kathaṃ vā na svīkriyate iti bhāvaḥ /

original: kīdṛśāya---āhave yuddhe jagatyuddaṇḍaṃ rājamaṇḍalaṃ nṛpatimaṇḍalameva rājamaṇḍaṃla candramaṇḍalaṃ tadīyarāhave saihikeyāya tattiraskārakatvāt
analyzed: kīdṛśāya āhave yuddhe jagatī uddaṇḍam rāja maṇḍalam nṛpati maṇḍalam eva candra maṇḍalam tadīya rāhave saihikeyāya tad tiraskāraka tvāt
atra nṛpati maṇḍala sambandhi tvena rāhu tva āropaḥ nu papannaḥ rāhoḥ nṛpati maṇḍala tiraskāraka tva abhāvāt
atas mukhya tad āropa sādhakaḥ nṛpati maṇḍale candra maṇḍala āropaḥ
śliṣṭa rāja śabdena ca tad ubhaya upasthāpanam etat āha atra iti

original: atra ca mukhyarūpakanirvāhāya dvayornṛpaticandrayoḥ prākaraṇikatvādādāveva nṛpacandro rājapadavācyo na tu candro vyaṅgyaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca mukhya rūpaka nirvāhāya dvayoḥ nṛpati candrayoḥ prākaraṇika tvāt ādau eva nṛpa candraḥ rāja pada vācyaḥ na tu candraḥ vyaṅgyaḥ
ekārtha mātre prakaraṇa tve eva anya arthasya vyaṅgya tvāt
atas nā atra vācya sādhaka tva vyaṅgya rūpasya vācya siddhyā aṅga ākhya guṇībhūta vyaṅgya tvasya prasaktiḥ

original: yatra tu kasyacidāropaṃ vinaiva prathamaṃ mukhyarūpakaṃ siddhyati paścāttādṛśanirūpyamāṇasyāparapadārthānvayānupapattistatraprākaraṇike
analyzed: yatra tu kasyacid āropam vinā eva prathamam mukhya rūpakam siddhyati paścāt tādṛśa nirūpyamāṇasya apara padārtha anvaya anupapattiḥ tatra prākaraṇike
tādṛśa apara padārthe niyantrakasya śliṣṭa śabdasya apara arthaḥ

original: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām” //

original: ityatra śyāmatvenopakārakatvena ca jalade bhujagarūpaṇaṃ prathamaṃ siddhyatyeva /

original: ityatra nayanāgneḥ taruṇatvasya prauḍhatvarūpamarthamādāya prathamamabhidhāyā viśrāmād vyañjanayaiva yuvarūpor'thaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: iti atra nayana agneḥ taruṇa tvasya prauḍha tva rūpam artham ādāya prathamam abhidhāyāḥ viśrāmāt vyañjanayā eva pratīyate

original: iha tu kṣitibhṛta ityādau bahūnāṃ rūpaṇāt pratāpasya taruṇatvarūpaṇaṃ śābdam /
analyzed: iha tu kṣitibhṛtaḥ ityādau bahūnām rūpaṇāt pratāpasya taruṇa tva rūpaṇam śābdam
itas ca ramate ityādi padānām rūpaka sādhakatā eva
na tu dyām āliliṅga ityādau āliṅgana ādīnām iva samāsokti sādhaka tā
anyathā sarvatra eva eka deśa vivarti rūpakeṣu samāsokti prasaṅgaḥ syāt

original: haṭhādānīya ramata ityatra kāryyasāmye 'pi na samāsoktiḥ /
analyzed: haṭhāt ānīya ramate iti atra kāryya sāmye na samāsoktiḥ

original: yadi hi kāryyaleśasāmyaṃ vā samāśritya samāsoktiraṅgīkāryyā tadekadeśavivartirūpakasya viṣayāpahāra eva syāt,
analyzed: yadi hi kāryya leśa sāmyam vā samāśritya samāsoktiḥ aṅgīkāryyā tad eka deśa vivarti rūpakasya viṣaya apahāraḥ eva syāt
tasya an evaṃvidha sva lakṣyasya a prasiddheḥ

original: yatra vācā rūpaṇaṃ nāsti dyāmāliliṅgetyādi samāsoktyudāharaṇavat kāryyasāmyabāhulyasamvalitatvam,
analyzed: yatra vācā rūpaṇam na asti dyām āliliṅga ityādi samāsokti udāharaṇa vat kāryya sāmya bāhulya samvalita tvam
tatra eva sāmagṣa bhāvāt aprastuta nāyikā tādātmyam pratīyate

original: ābhātītyādau ca vācyarūpaṇānāṃ bahutvena kāryyādisāmyaṃ svalpatayā tatsahāyyamevācarati iti /
analyzed: ābhāti ityādau ca vācya rūpaṇānām bahu tvena kāryya ādi sāmyam su alpa tayā tad sahāyyam eva ācarati iti
ari kīrtti ādeḥ tādātmya pratīti hetu tvam sahṛdaya anubhava siddham na tu vyavahāra samāha upajīvi tā samāsoktiḥ

original: anayośca samāsoktyekadeśavivartirūpakayoraparamapi yuktijātamihaiva samāsoktiprastāve suvyaktaṃ bhaviṣyatītyalaṃ bahunā /
analyzed: anayoḥ ca samāsokti eka deśa vivarti rūpakayoḥ aparam api yukti jātam iha eva samāsokti prastāve su vyaktam bhaviṣyati iti alam bahunā

original: nanvatra kathaṃ rūpakamevetyuktaṃ sūkṣmāgratvena kaṭhoratvena ca pulakāṅkurāṇāṃ kaṇṭakabhedasya vāstavatvādevetyāha---āropyamāṇeti /

original: atra yadyapi pulakasya kaṇṭakāropaviṣayatvameva kaṇṭakatvenāropyamāṇatvaṃ yathāpi pādabhedakāryyakatve 'nāropyamāṇasyetyarthaḥ /

original: tathāca tatkāryyanirvāhakatvaṃ yatastasyāropyamāṇamatastasya kaṇṭakatvamapi na vāstavam /

nanu pādabheda kāryya nivārhaka tvam eva pulaka aṅkurāṇām asti
tat katham avāstava tvam iti āha na khalu iti
tat pulaka aṅkura agram kasyacid api bhedaḥ hi prastutam kāryyam

yathā
vanecarāṇām vanitā sakhānām darī gṛha utsaṅga niṣakta bhāsaḥ
bhavanti yatra auṣadhayaḥ rajanyām ataila pūrāḥ surata pradīpāḥ
atra pradīpānām auṣadhī ātma tayā prakṛte surata upayogini andhakāra nāśe upayogaḥ talapūra tvena adhika ārūḍha vaiśiṣṭyam
vijña priyā
vi vanecarāṇām iti

original: yatra himālaye auṣadhaya eva rajanyāṃ vanecarāṇāṃ vanitāsakhānāṃ suratapradīpā bhavanti ityanvayaḥ /
analyzed: yatra himālaye auṣadhayaḥ eva rajanyām vanecarāṇām vanitā sakhānām surata pradīpāḥ bhavanti iti anvayaḥ
pradīpībhāve hetum āha darī gṛha iti
a taila pūrāḥ taila pūraṇa rahitāḥ taila samūha rahitāḥ vā
atra pradīpībhāvasya prakṛta artha upayogi tvam darśayati atra iti
prakṛte surata upayogi andhakāra nāśe pradīpānām auṣadhī ātma tayā upayogaḥ iti anvayaḥ
auṣadhī ātma tayā pariṇāmasya iti api kvacid dhobhanaḥ pāṭhaḥ
auṣadhi ātma tayā prakṛtaḥ iti kvacid prāmādikaḥ pāṭhaḥ
na ca suratam eva śābdam prakṛtam na andhakāra nāśaḥ
tasya a śābda tvāt iti vācyam
surata upayogi tvena tasya api prakṛta tvāt
saṃdehaḥ prakṛte nyasya saṃśayaḥ pratibhā utthitaḥ
śuddhaḥ niścaya garbhaḥ sau niścaya antaḥ iti tridhā
vijña priyā
sandeha alaṅkāram āha sandehaḥ iti

original: pratibhayā utthito 'nyasyāprastutārthakoṭeḥ prastute vastuni yaḥ saṃśayaḥ sa sandehālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: pratibhayā utthitaḥ nyasya aprastuta artha koṭeḥ prastute vastuni yaḥ saṃśayaḥ sa sandeha alaṅkāraḥ iti arthaḥ
locanā
sandehaḥ sandeha ākhyaḥ laṅkāraḥ
prakṛte varṇyamāne anyasya āropyamāṇasya
evam ca prakṛta sandehe prakṛtam api sandihyate eva
evam ca prakṛta aprakṛta viṣaya saṃśaya jñānam sandeha alaṅkāraḥ iti arthaḥ
saṃśayaḥ ca vyavasthāna ādi aneka koṭika jñānam

original: evaṃca saṃśaya ityetāvataiva lakṣaṇe paryāpte prakṛte anyasyeti vacanaṃ “madhyaṃ tava ” ityādi vṛttyudāhariṣyamāṇavyavacchedārtham /
analyzed: evam ca saṃśayaḥ iti etāvatā eva lakṣaṇe paryāpte prakṛte anyasya iti vacanam madhyam tava ityādi vṛtti udāhariṣyamāṇa vyavaccheda artham
pratibhā utthitaḥ iti
pratibhā kaveḥ

original: “kiṃ tāruṇyataroriyaṃ rasabhahodbhinnā navā vallarī velāprocchalitasya kiṃ laharikā lāvaṇyavārāṃnidheḥ /

original: udrāḍhotkalikāvatāṃ svasamayopanyāsaviśrambhiṇaḥ kiṃ sākṣādupadeśayaṣṭirathavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ” //
analyzed: udrāḍha utkalikāvatām sva samaya upanyāsa viśrambhiṇaḥ kim sākṣāt upadeśa yaṣṭiḥ athavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ

original: kiṃ vā śṛṅgāriṇo devasya kandarpasya arthāt śṛṅgārārthamuddamotkalikānatāṃ gāḍhotkaṇṭhāvatāṃ janānāṃ sthāne upadeśasya arthāt śṛṅgāropadeśsya  #

original: devasya kīdṛśasya svasamayasya vasantasya upanyāsena viśrammiṇo viśvastasya mamedānīmupadeśo yogya ityaveṃ viśvāsavata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: devasya kīdṛśasya sva samayasya vasantasya upanyāsena viśrammiṇaḥ viśvastasya mama idānīm upadeśaḥ yogyaḥ viśvāsavataḥ iti arthaḥ

analyzed: ayam mārtaṇḍaḥ kim sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiḥ itas kṛśānuḥ kim sarvāḥ prasarati diśaḥ nā eṣa niyatam

original: vācyā pratīyamānā sā prathamaṃ dvividhā matā // VisSd_10.40 //
analyzed: vācyā pratīyamānā sā prathamam dvividhā matā

original: jātiguṇaḥ kriyā dravyaṃ yadutprekṣyaṃ dvayorapi // VisSd_10.41 //

dvātriṃśat vidha tām yānti
vijña priyā

original: (vi, tha) asyā vibhaktavibhāgabāhulyena ṣaṭsaptatyuttaraikaśatavidhatāṃ paryavasthāpayitumādau dvaividhyamāha---vācyeti /
analyzed: asyāḥ vibhakta vibhāga bāhulyena ṣaṭsaptati uttara ekaśatavidha tām paryavasthāpayitum ādau dvaividhyam āha vācyā iti

analyzed: bhāvasya jāti ādi bhāva catuṣkasya pratyekam abhāva abhimānataḥ bhāva utprekṣaṇāt api tat aṣṭadhā tasyāḥ utprekṣāyāḥ aṣṭadhā aṣṭa prakāra bhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: te vācyapratīyamānatvabhedādaṣṭau jātyādibhāvotprekṣā aṣṭau ca tadabhāvotprekṣāśca iti ṣoḍaśaiva guṇakriyāhetuvattvena dvaiguṇyād dvātriṃśadityarthaḥ

yathā rājā pākaśāsanaḥ iti

vijña priyā
asyāḥ hetu phala gāmi tvam eva uktam
sva rūpa gāmi tvena apara prabheda vṛddhiḥ ca katham na darśitā iti atra āha sva rūpa utprekṣā api atra iti
tad asambhavam upapādayati dharmi antara iti
prakṛte dharmiṇī aprakṛta dharmi antara tādātmyam yatra nibandhayate

atra bhede pi abheda āropa rūpa atiśayoktiḥ

dvātriṃśat prakārā iti

original: viṣayiṇo 'bhedapratipattirarthād viṣaye adhyavasāya iha vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /

original: tadapyavispaṣṭārthamato viśeṣārthakaṃ śabdaṃ vinā vyañjanayaiva viṣayaniṣedhabuddhiradhaḥ karaṇam /

apahnuti niścaya alaṅkārayoḥ niṣedha arthaka śabdaḥ eva asti iti atas na tatra niṣedha vyañjanā

atra mukula śrī darśanasya kāraṇasya janya utkaṇṭhā uttara upapanna tvena nirdeśāt viparyyayaḥ
āhārya buddhi viṣayeṇa tena kāraṇasya śīghrakāri tvam vyajyate
atra api uttara upapanna tvāt āropa viṣayasya pūrva utpannasya niṣedha vyañjanā
evam uttaratra api bodhyam

laḥ a utkalikā
utkaṇṭhā

original: tena siṃhāsanaṃ pitryaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca kahīkṣitām” //
analyzed: tena siṃhāsanam pitryam maṇḍalam ca kahīkṣitām
vijña priyā
vi raghuṇā
pitṛ siṃhāsana ākramaṇa rūpa kāraṇasya mahīkṣit maṇḍala ākramaṇa rūpa kāryyasya sama kāla upapanna tva kathanāt pairvāparyya viparyayaḥ
iha kecid āhuḥ keśa pāśa ādi gataḥ laukikaḥ tiśayaḥ laukika tvena adhyavasīyate
keśa pāśa ādīnām kalāpa ādibhiḥ adhyavasāye anyat eva aṅga lāvaṇyam ityādi prakāreṣu avyāptiḥ lakṣaṇasya iti
tat na tatra api hi anyat aṅga lāvaṇyam anya tvena adhyavasīyate
tathā hi anyat eva iti sthāne anyat iva iti pāṭhe dhyavasāyasya asādhya tvam eva iti utprekṣā aṅgīkriyate
pragā iva hariṇa akṣīṇām iti atra bakula ādī śrīṇām prathama bhāvitā api paścāt bhāvi tvena adhyavasitā
atas eva atra api iva śabda yoge utprekṣā evam anyatra
vijña priyā
ra granthakṛt uktasya atiśayokti sāmānya lakṣaṇasya anyat eva aṅga lāvaṇyam ityādau avyāptim kecid āhuḥ tat dūṣayitum āha eha kecid iti
viṣaye viṣayiṇaḥ bhedena adhyavasāyaḥ hi bhavat kṛta lakṣaṇa arthaḥ
viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ ca bheda ghaṭitaḥ
tathā ca katham upari kalāpinaḥ iti atra keśa kalāpayoḥ bheda sattavāt tad lakṣaṇa artha sambhave anyat eva aṅga lāvaṇyam

original: ityatra tatraiva tadbhedārope bhedaghaṭitaviṣayaviṣayibhāvābhāvādavyāptiriti keṣāñciduktiṃ darśayati---keśapāśādigata iti /
analyzed: iti atra tatra eva tad bheda ārope bheda ghaṭita viṣaya viṣayi bhāva abhāvāt avyāptiḥ iti keṣāñcid uktim darśayati keśa pāśa ādi gataḥ iti
atiśayaḥ saundaryyam laukikaḥ nyaloka keśa sādhāraṇaḥ alaukika tvena loka vilakṣaṇa kalāpa niṣṭa saundaryya tvena adhyavasītaye iti arthaḥ
tayoḥ saundaryayoḥ abheda adhyāsa mūlaka keśa pāśa kalāpayoḥ bhinnayoḥ abheda dhyāsaḥ sambhavati iti āha keśā pāśa ādīnām iti
adhyavasāye iti anantaram sambhavati api iti pūraṇīyam
tathā api anyat eva ityādi prakāreṣu avyāptiḥ iti āha anyat eva iti
āropyamāṇa ropa viṣaya lāvaṇyayoḥ bheda abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ
abhede bheda āropaḥ smad ukta lakṣaṇa arthe bruvan samādhatte tat na
tatra hi iti
ananya daṅga lāvaṇyam abhinna maṅga lāvaṇyam anya tvena bhinna tvena adhyavasīyate iti arthaḥ

original: tathā ca bhinnatvenādhyavasāyādāropaviṣaye 'bhede tadbhinnasya bhedasyāropād bhedaghaṭīto viṣayaviṣayibhāvo 'trāpyastīti sādhitam /
analyzed: tathā ca bhinna tvena adhyavasāyāt āropa viṣaye bhede tad bhinnasya bhedasya āropāt bheda ghaṭītaḥ sādhitam
utprekṣāyām viṣaya viṣayi bheda ghaṭitaḥ āropaḥ tava api sammataḥ

original: atraivotprekṣāsambhavād bhedaghaṭitāropaḥ tvanmate 'pītyāha---tathā hīti---atiśayoktito vāyavṛttidarśanāya sādhyatvapradarśanam “prāgeva hariṇākṣīṇām';
analyzed: atra eva utprekṣā sambhavāt bheda ghaṭita āropaḥ tvad mate pi iti āha tathā hi iti atiśayoktitaḥ vāya vṛtti darśanāya sādhya tva pradarśanam prāk eva hariṇa akṣīṇām
iti atra api bheda ghaṭītaḥ viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ sti iti darśayati
atra api utprekṣā sambhavam darśayati atas eva iti
bheda ghaṭita viṣaya viṣayi bhāva sattvāt eva iti arthaḥ

lo ā laukikaḥ svābhāvikaḥ
alaukika tvena adhyavasāya phala bhūta alaukika atiśaya tvena aṅga lāvaṇyam iti ādi śabdena priyaḥ iti gopa vadhūbhiḥ ityādeḥ upasaṃgrahaḥ
avyāpti lakṣaṇasya iti ayam āśayaḥ

original: prativastūpamāyāṃ tūpameyanirdiṣṭo dharmo vācya eva upamānanirdiṣṭaśabdasya lakṣaṇayā kvacicchaktyā vā sa bodhya iti bhedaḥ /

original: ca aindre dhanuṣi ārdranakhakṣatatulyatvāprāptau nāyikāyāṃ ca viśeṣaṇābhāvena tadviśeṣaṇasya

original: kintvatra payodharasya prasādayantīti padasya sakalaṅkapadasya tāpapadasya ca śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇikā samāsoktireveyam /

original: kāraṇavyañjakakāryarūpāyāmaprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ tu aprastutena kāryeṇa prastutaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyajyate iti bhedo vakṣyate yathā “indurlipta ivāñjanena”  #
analyzed: kāraṇa vyañjaka kārya rūpāyām aprastuta praśaṃsāyām tu aprastutena kāryeṇa prastutam kāraṇam vyajyate iti bhedaḥ vakṣyate yathā induḥ liptaḥ iva añjanena

original: atra hayagrīveṇa svargo vijita iti prastutameva gamyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vaicitryaviśeṣapratipattaye sainyasya pārijātamañjarīsāvajñasparśanarūpakāryadvāreṇābhihitam

original: śacyāḥ keśasambhogalālitāstāḥ prasiddhāḥ pārijātasya mañjaryo yasya iyagrīvasya nṛpasya sainikairnandane vane sāvajñaṃ spṛṣṭā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: śacyāḥ keśa sambhoga lālitāḥ tāḥ prasiddhāḥ pārijātasya mañjaryaḥ yasya iyagrīvasya nṛpasya sainikaiḥ nandane vane sa avajñam spṛṣṭāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: gamyaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ kāraṇarūpaṃ sāvatramañjarīsparśasya abhihitaṃ vyañjanayā pratipāditam /

original: ayaṃ ca kvacitkāraṇena vācyena kāryasya gamyatve 'pi sambhavati /

original: (vi, śa) aprastutakāryeṇa prastutakāraṇavyañjanarūpāyā aprastutapraśaṃsāyā udāharaṇaṃ “rājan rājasutā ityādika “kāvyaprakāśakṛtā dattam;

original: (vi, gha) viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya samarthanaṃ vaidharmyaiṇetyasyodāharaṇamūhyamiti vakṣyate /

atas tat an udāhṛtya sāmānyena viśeṣa samarthanam eva vaidharmyeṇa udāharati ittham iti

ārādhyamāna tva tad dharmasya viruddha dharmaḥ pratyaya kriyamāṇa tvam durjana sāmānyasya

original: idañca kāvyaliṅgasya heturvaicitaryāvahanena na nivarttata iti kāvyaliṅgākhyamalaṅkaraṇam /

original: atra sādhyasādhanayoreva dharmigatatvaṃ kāvyaprakāśakṛduktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ deyameva /

iyam antar priya vaktra candravatī tad kānti adhīna pāṇḍu deha kuḍmalita netra padma ttvāt iti anumānam

yatra patati abalānām dṛṣṭiḥ niśitāḥ patanti tatra śarāḥ
tat ca aparopita śaraḥ dhāvati āsām puras smaraḥ manye

śara iṣu puṣpa maya tvam bodhyam
teṣām niśita tvam tu āropyam

original: evañca darśitodāharaṇadvaye “jānīmahe” “manye” iti padayorutprekṣāvācakatve taddvaye utprekṣā naiveti bodhyam /

analyzed: hetumatā kāryeṇa saha hetoḥ abhedena abhidhā abhidhānam hetu nāmā alaṅkāraḥ iti arthaḥ

iti
dharma anabhijñā tvena dharmavaktrayā bālaka tvena sambodhitaḥ

original: evaṃ galitayauvanāyāḥ kāmavattvaṃ kāminyā galitayauvanatvaṃ vā anucitam /
analyzed: evam galita yauvanāyāḥ kāmavat tvam kāminyāḥ galita yauvana tvam vā anucitam
evam sarasaḥ vārija śūnya tvam
śobhana ākṛteḥ mūrkhasya akṣareṇa vidyayā śūnyatvam
prabhoḥ dhana parāyaṇa tvam
dhana parāyaṇa janasya prabhu tvam vā
sat janasya satata durgata tvam satata durgatasya sat jana tvam vā
gatasya khala tvam
khalasya nṛpa aṅā gaṇa gata tvam vā anucitām iti arthaḥ
atra śocyānām vidheyānām sat asat tva vaśāt sat asat yogaḥ

original: tatra daivādhānadoṣeṇa śocyasya sattvaṃ svādhīnadoṣeṇa śocyasyāsattvam /
analyzed: tatra daiva ādhāna doṣeṇa śocyasya sattvam svādhīna doṣeṇa śocyasya asattvam
tatra śaśinaḥ dhūsara tvam
sarasaḥ vārija śūnya tvam
su ākṛteḥ anakṣara mūrkha tvam

original: sajjanasya durgatatvaṃ tadaiva doṣāt śocyatvena śobhanam /
analyzed: sat janasya durgata tvam tadā eva doṣāt śocya tvena śobhanam

original: galitayauvanāyāṃ kāmavattvasya vidheyatvapakṣe vidheyasya tasya prabhordhanaparāyaṇasya dhanaparāyaṇe prabhutvasya vā,
analyzed: galita yauvanāyām kāmavat tvasya vidheya tva pakṣe vidheyasya tasya prabhoḥ dhana parāyaṇasya dhana parāyaṇe prabhu tvasya vā

original: vidheyasya khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatatvasya nṛpāṅgaṇagate khalatvasya vā bidheyasya svādhīnadoṣeṇa śocyatvāda śobhanatvamiti vidheyānāmeva sadasattvam
analyzed: vidheyasya khale nṛpa aṅgaṇa gata tvasya nṛpa aṅgaṇa gate khala tvasya vā bidheyasya svādhīna doṣeṇa śocya tvāt śobhana tvam iti vidheyānām eva sat asat tvam

original: iha kecidāhuḥ--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ śobhanatvaṃ khalasyāśobhanatvaṃ ceti sadasadyogaḥ”
analyzed: iha kecid āhuḥ śaśi prabhṛtīnām śobhana tvam khalasya aśobhana tvam ca iti sat asat yogaḥ

original: iti anye tu--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ svataḥ śobhanatvaṃ dhūsaratvādīnāṃ tvaśobhanatvamiti sadasadyogaḥ” /
analyzed: iti anye tu śaśi prabhṛtīnām svatas śobhana tvam dhūsara tva ādīnām tu aśobhana tvam iti sat asat yogaḥ

original: atra hi śaśiprabhṛtiṣu dhūsaratvāderatyantacitatvamiti vicchittiviśeṣasyaiva camatkāravidhāyitvam /
analyzed: atra hi śaśi prabhṛtiṣu dhūsara tva ādeḥ atyanta cita tvam iti vicchitti viśeṣasya eva camatkāra vidhāyi tvam
manasi sapta śalyāni me iti saptānām api śalya tvena upasaṃhāraḥ ca

original: “nṛpāṅganagataḥ khala” iti tu kramabhedādduṣṭatvamāvahati sarvatra viśeṣyasyaiva śobhanatvena prakramāditi /
analyzed: nṛpa aṅgana gataḥ khalaḥ iti tu krama bhedāt duṣṭa tvam āvahati sarvatra viśeṣyasya eva śobhana tvena prakramāt iti
iha ca khalekapota vat sarveṣām kāraṇānām sāhityena avatāraḥ

original: samādhyalaṅkāre tvekakāryaṃ prati sādhake samagre 'pyanyasya kākatālīyanyāyenāpatanamiti bhedaḥ /
analyzed: samādhi alaṅkāre tu eka kāryam prati sādhake samagre pi anyasya kākatālīya nyāyena āpatanam iti bhedaḥ

original: (vi, kha) pūrvoktaślokepi vidheyānāmeva tathātvād bhinnābhiprāya granthakṛnmanasi kṛtvāparoktaṃ sadasadyogaṃ darśayati---iha keciditi /
analyzed: vi kha pūrva ukta śloke api vidheyānām eva tathātvāt bhinna abhiprāya granthakṛt manasi kṛtvā apara uktam sat asat yogam darśayati iha kecid iti
mata antaram āha anye tu iti
etad mate uddeśya vidheyayoḥ viśeṣya viśeṣaṇayoḥ sat asatoḥ yogaḥ
teṣām mate tathātvam eva vicchitti viśeṣāt camatkāraḥ tat ṛrśayati atrahi iti

original: uddeśye sattvāsattvābhyāṃ tu teṣāṃ matena camatkāra ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: uddeśye sattva asattvābhyām tu teṣām matena camatkāraḥ iti arthaḥ
teṣām sat asat tve eva tāvat alaṅkāraḥ

tat eva grāhayati sarvatra iti
śasī dhūsaraḥ ityādi uddeśya vidheya arthaka sarva vākye iti arthaḥ
ayam ca doṣaḥ

original: khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatvasya vidheyatā gatatvasya vidheyatāpakṣa eva nṛpāṅgaṇagatade khalatvasya vidhayatā pakṣetūddeśyaḥ śobhana eveti naiṣa doṣa  #
analyzed: khale nṛpa aṅgaṇa ga tvasya vidheya tā gata tvasya vidheya tā pakṣaḥ eva nṛpa aṅgaṇa gata de khala tvasya pakṣa itu uddeśyaḥ śobhanaḥ eva iti na eṣa doṣa
iti bodhyam

original: ekakāraṇādeva sukare kārye daivāt kāraṇāntarā'gamanarūpāt samādhyalaṅkārādasya bhedamāha---iha ca khaleti /

original: mukhamānataṃ ca sakhi te jvalitaścāsyāntare smarajvalanaḥ” //

atra ādya irthe guṇayoḥ yaugapadyam

vijña priyā

original: (vi, ga) guṇayoḥ kriyayośca yogapadyarūpaṃ samuccayamāha---aruṇe ceti /
analyzed: vi ga guṇayoḥ kriyayoḥ ca yogapadya rūpam samuccayam āha aruṇe ca iti
atra cakārau yaugapadya bodhakau

original: tau ca yayoruttarabhūtau tayoryaugapadyabodhakau ityata āhaatrādye iti /
analyzed: tau ca yayoḥ uttara bhūtau tayoḥ yaugapadya bodhakau iti atas āha atra ādye iti
ubhayoḥ yaugapadye yathā
kaluṣam ca tava ahiteṣu akasmāt sita paṅkeruha sodara śri caśruḥ
patitam ca mahīpati indra
teṣām vapuṣi prasphuṭam āpadām kaṭākṣaiḥ
vijña priyā
vi gha kaluṣam ceti
ahiteṣu vipakṣeṣu
mahīpati indra iti sambodhanam
atra pūrva ardhe guṇa uttaram cakāraḥ
pāra ardhe tu kriyāttaram iti anayoḥ yaugapadyam

eka adhikaraṇe raṇa sthala rūpe
vyadhikaraṇye api eṣa dṛśyate iti kāvyaprakāśa kṛt
yathā kṛpāṇa pāṇiḥ ca bhavān raṇa kṣitau
rasādhuvādāḥ ca surāḥ surālaye
iti atra raṇa kṣiti surālaya rūpa adhikaraṇa bhedaḥ
dhunoti ca asim tanute ca kīrtim
ityādau eka adhikaraṇe pi eṣa dṛśyate
na ca atra dīpakam
ete hi guṇa kriyā yaugapadye samuccaya prakārāḥ niyamena kārya kāraṇa kāla niyama viparyaya rūpa atiśayokti mūlāḥ
dīpakasya ca atiśayokti mūla tva abhāvaḥ
vijña priyā
vi ṅa dhunoti ca asi
m iti udāharaṇe ekasmin kartṛ kārake neka kriyā sambandhāt aneka kriyāsu eka kāraka rūpa dīpaka prasāktim āśaṅkya niṣidhyati na ca atra iti

original: ete guṇākriyāyaugapadye ye samuccayaprakārāste kāryakāraṇayoryaḥ paurvāparyyarūpaḥ kālaniyamaḥ tadviparyyayarūpātiśayoktimūlā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ete guṇa akriyā yaugapadye ye samuccaya prakārāḥ te kārya kāraṇayoḥ yaḥ paurvāparyya rūpaḥ kāla niyamaḥ tad viparyaya rūpa atiśayokti mūlāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: darśitodāharaṇeṣu sarvatraiva guṇayoḥ kriyayorvā kāryakāraṇabhāvasattvepi yaugapadyokteḥ /

dīpake tu tathātvam na asti iti āha dīpakasya iti

original: tathā cet taddvayābhāve satīti viśeṣaṇaṃ deyamityabhiprāyaḥ /

original: (vi, ḍha) atra bhavadiva dṛśyante yānītyanena halāhalasyopamānatvenaiva nirdeśaḥ /

original: tathā cārthavaimalyaṃ prasādo yaḥ paroktaḥ prasādaguṇaḥ sa evāyaṃ tadbhinnavaicitryaviśeṣābhāvād bhāvikanāmālaṅkāro nāstītyāśaṅkate---na cāyamiti
analyzed: tathā ca artha vaimalyam prasādaḥ yaḥ para uktaḥ prasāda guṇaḥ saḥ eva ayam tad bhinna vaicitrya viśeṣa abhāvāt bhāvika nāma alaṅkāraḥ nā asti iti āśaṅkatena ca ayam iti
samādhatte bhūta bhāvinoḥ iti
tayoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇa tve grāhye tasya pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvasya ahetuka tvāt ahetuka tva sphuraṇāt iti arthaḥ
tathā ca ahetuka tva sphuraṇa vaiśiṣṭya rūpa vaicitryam eva bhāvika alaṅkāraḥ iti uktam
na ca adbhutaḥ rasaḥ
vismayam pratyasya hetu tvāt
vijña priyā
vi gha nanu ahetuka tvena hetu anusandhānam vismayaḥ eva

samādhatte vismayam prati iti
ahetuka tva jñāna viśiṣṭam bhāvi bhūta vastu pratyakṣāyamāṇa tvam eva ayam alaṅkāraḥ
tasya vismayam prati hetu tvāt eva
na tu vismaya rūpa tvāt iti arthaḥ

samādhatte adhyavasāya iti

original: prakṛtasyānyatādātmyabhrama eva bhrāntimānna cātrābhūtabhāvipadārthāḥ prakṛtāstatra bhūtabhāvitāvibhramaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtasya anya tādātmya bhramaḥ eva bhrāntimān na ca atra abhūta bhāvi padārthāḥ prakṛtāḥ tatra bhūta bhāvi tā vibhramaḥ
kintu bhūta bhāvi padārtham prakṛtya tatra eva tathātva prakāśanāt iti arthaḥ

asya tu vastunaḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇa svarūpaḥ vicchitti viśeṣaḥ sti iti

original: yadi punarvastunaḥ kvacitsvabhāvoktāvapyasyā vicchitteḥ sambhavastadobhayoḥ saṅkaraḥ /

original: (vi, bha) aparāṅgarasādāvapi alaṅkārapadaṃ śaktameva na bhāktamiti vadatāṃ matamāha--apare ceti /

original: etanmate tu upamāderivāṅgabhūtarasoderapi śabdārthomayopakārakadvāraiva rasopakārakatayālaṅkārapadavācyateti viśeṣaḥ /

original: sā ca mandā kinyā vastuvṛttena yatpādamūlaveṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūlaveṣṭanamiti śleṣamutthāpayatīti tasyāṅgam /

śleṣam utthāpayati iti
śleṣe jñāpayati iti arthaḥ
nirmoke gaṅgā āropa abhāve caraṇa arthaka śleṣa apratīteḥ iti arthaḥ
saca śleṣa atiśayokteḥ aṅgam iti āha śleṣaḥ ca iti
atiśayoktim darśayati pāda mūla veṣṭanam eva sevanam iti iti bhede pi abheda āropa rūpa atiśayoktiḥ iyam
na tu rūpakam rūpaka adhikaraṇasya sevanasya anirdiṣṭa tvāt caraṇa arthaka pāda śleṣāt eva sevā bodhāt
śleṣaḥ tad jñāpakaḥ iti arthaḥ
atiśayoktiḥ api vācya utprekṣāyāḥ aṅgam iti āha atiśayoktiḥ api iti

original: iyaṃ tu prakarṣakamaṅgaṃ sevājñānaṃ vinā manthavyathopaśamanārthatāyāḥ veṣṭanamātrasyāsambhavenātprekṣāyāstathā prakarṣaṇaāt /
analyzed: iyam tu prakarṣakam aṅgam sevā jñānam vinā mantha vyathā upaśamana artha tāyāḥ veṣṭana mātrasya asambhavena ātprekṣāyāḥ tathā
na tu jñāpakam aṅgam
iva śabdāt eva tasyāḥ pratīteḥ
nā api janakam aṅgam utkaṭa koṭi saṃśaya ātmikāyāḥ utprekṣāyāḥ sevā jñānena
utprekṣā api samāsokteḥ jñāpakam aṅgam iti āha autprekṣā ca iti
samudra gaṅgayoḥ nāyaka nāyikā vyavahāra jñānasya mantha vyathā īpa śāma artha tā utprekṣām vinā acetanayoḥ asambhavāt
yathā vā
anurāgavatī saṃdhyām divasaḥ tat puras saraḥ
aho daiva gatiḥ citrā tathā api na samāgamaḥ
atra samāsokti viśeṣokteḥ aṅgam
vijña priyā
aneka alaṅkāraṇam aṅga aṅgi bhāvam uktvā alaṅkārayoḥ tathātvam āha yathā vā iti
sāyam sandhyā varṇanam idam
anu divasasya paścāt rāgavatī raktimavatī sandhyā
divasaḥ ca tasyāḥ puras saraḥ
aho āścaryam
citrā vilakṣaṇā daiva gatiḥ yatas tathā api na samāgamaḥ

original: puraḥ paścādbhāvena sthitayorekadā milarūpasya samāgamasyaiva dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: puras paścāt bhāvena sthitayoḥ ekadā mila rūpasya samāgamasya eva dṛṣṭa tvāt
divasa sandhyayoḥ tu na ekadā milanam
sandhyā kāle divasa abhāvāt
atra samāsoktiḥ iti
atra rāgavat nāyikā puras sara nāyakayoḥ daivāt samāgama rahitayoḥ vṛttānta pratīti rūpā samāsoktiḥ
pūrva paścāt bhāva sthiti rūpasya samāgama hetoḥ sattve api samāgama rūpa phalasya abhāva rūpāyāḥ viśeṣa ukteḥ jñāpaka hetuḥ iti arthaḥ
nāyaka nāyikā samāgama abhāva pratīteḥ nāyake vṛttānta pratītim vinā asambhavāt
janaka rūpa aṅga udāharaṇam tu na darśitam

original: ttu yathā-- “pulindāste ripustrīṇāṃ vane hāraṃ haranti no /
analyzed: t tu yathā pulindāḥ te ripu strīṇām vane hāram haranti no

original: bimboṣṭhakāntyā śoṇaṃ taṃ guñjamālāṃ hi manyate //
analyzed: bimba uṣṭha kāntyā śoṇam tam guñja mālām hi manyate
atra hāreṇa bimboṣṭha kānteḥ grahaṇāt tad guṇaḥ laṅkāraḥ
tena ca guñjā āhāra bhrānti jananāt bhrāntimān tad guṇasya prakarṣakam aṅgam
saṃdeha saṅkaraḥ yathā
idam ābhāti gagane bhindānam santatam tamaḥ
a manda nayana ānda karam maṇḍalam aindavam
vijña priyā
vi ga bahūnām alaṅkārāṇām sandeha saṅkaram āha edam ābhāti iti
idam aindava maṇḍalam gagane ābhāti

original: kīdṛśaṃ santataṃ vistṛtaṃ tamaḥ andhākāram ajñānaṃ ca bhindānamamandanayanānandakaraṃ ca /
analyzed: kīdṛśam santatam vistṛtam tamaḥ andha ākāram ajñānam ca ca
atra kim mukhasya candra tayā adhvasānāt atiśayoktiḥ
uta idam iti mukham nirdiśya candra tva āropāt rūpakam

original: athavā idamiti mukhasya candramaṇḍalasya ca dvayorapi prakṛtayorekadharmābhisaṃbandhāttulyayogitā,
analyzed: athavā idam iti mukhasya candra maṇḍalasya ca dvayoḥ api prakṛtayoḥ eka dharma abhisaṃbandhāt tulya yogitā
āhosvit candrasya aprakṛta tvāt dīpakam
kim vā viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt aprastutasya mukhasya gamya tvāt samāsoktiḥ
yat vā aprastuta candra varṇanayā prastutasya mukhasya avagatiḥ iti aprastuta praśaṃsā

original: yadvā manmathoddīpanaḥ kālaḥ svakāryabhūtacandravarṇanāmukhena vaṇita iti paryāyoktiriti bahūnāmalaṅkarāṇāṃ saṃdehātsaṃdehasaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: yat vā manmatha uddīpanaḥ kālaḥ sva kārya bhūta candra varṇanā mukhena vaṇitaḥ iti paryāyoktiḥ iti bahūnām alaṅkarāṇām saṃdehāt saṃdeha saṅkaraḥ
vijña priyā

original: (vi, gha) atrālaṅkārāṇāṃ saṃśayakoṭitāṃ darśayati--atreti . idaṃ gagane aindavaṃ maṇḍalamarthānnāyikāyāmābhātītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: vi gha atra alaṅkārāṇām saṃśaya koṭi tām darśayati atra iti idam gagane aindavam maṇḍalam arthāt nāyikāyām ābhāti iti arthaḥ
evam ca āropa adhikaraṇasya mukhasya anirdeśāt atiśayoktiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: mukhasyedaṃ padena nirdeśe tu rūpakamityāha uteti /
analyzed: mukhasya idam padena nirdeśe tu rūpakam iti āha uta iti
tulya yogitām darśayati athavā iti

original: tathāṃ ca idaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ mukhaṃ gagane aindavaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cābhātītyartaḥ /
analyzed: ca idam nirdiśyamānam mukham gagane aindavam maṇḍalam ca ābhāti iti artaḥ
dvayoḥ api prakṛtayoḥ iti
ubhayasya eva dīpyamāna tva varṇane krama sattve iti arthaḥ

original: mukhasyaiva prakrāntatve tadupamānatayaiva candranirdeśe tu tasyāprakṛtatvāt prakṛtāprakṛtayorekadharmānvayarūpaṃ dīpakamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: mukhasya eva prakrānta tve tad upamāna tayā eva candra nirdeśe tu tasya aprakṛta tvāt prakṛta aprakṛtayoḥ eka dharma anvaya rūpam dīpakam iti arthaḥ
samāsoktim darśayati kiṃvā iti
candra varṇanasya eva prakrānta tve prastuta praśaṃsā iti āha yat vā iti
kārya bhūtā iti
candra udayasya sandhyā kāla kārya tvāt

original: yathā vā--“mukhacandraṃ paśyāmi” ityatra kiṃ mukhaṃ candra iva ityupamā ?
analyzed: yathā vā amukha candram paśyāmi iti atra kim mukham candraḥ iva iti upamā
uta candraḥ eva iti rūpakam iti saṃdehaḥ
sādhaka bādhakayoḥ dvayoḥ ekatarasya sadbhāve na punar saṃdehaḥ
yathā
mukha candram cumbati iti atra cumbanam mukhasya anukūlam iti upamāyāḥ sādhakam
candrasya tu pratikūlam iti rūpakasya bādhakam

original: “mukhacandraḥ prakāśate” ityatra prakāśākhyo dharmo rūpakasya sādhako mukhe upacaritatvena saṃbhavatīti nopamābādhakaḥ /
analyzed: mukha candraḥ prakāśate iti atra prakāśa ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ rūpakasya sādhakaḥ mukhe upacarita tvena saṃbhavati iti na upamā bādhakaḥ
vijña priyā
alaṅkāra dvaya sandeham darśayati yathā vā iti

original: mukhacandraṃ cumbatīti mukhasyānukūlaṃ candratulyamukha eva sākṣādanvitamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: mukha candram cumbati iti mukhasya anukūlam candra tulya mukhe eva sākṣāt anvitam iti arthaḥ
na tu mukha ātmake candre sambhoga cumbana asambhavāt
tu pratikūlam iti
mukha niṣṭhasya cumbanasya mukha abhinna tvena gṛhīta candre pi parasparasya asambhavāt
prakāśa ākhyaḥ iti
tibhiḥ anāśa ākhyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: saca dharmaścandre eva sākṣāstītyato viśeṣyatvena pratīyamāne candre sākṣādanvitatvādrūpakasya sādhaka ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: saca dharmaḥ candre eva sākṣāt asti iti atas viśeṣya tvena pratīyamāne candre sākṣāt anvita tvāt rūpakasya sādhakaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: upamāyāstu na bādhaka ityata āhamukhe upacaritatveneti /
analyzed: upamāyāḥ tu na bādhakaḥ iti atas āha mukhe upacarita tvena iti
candra tulya mukhe candra dharma prakāśana āropa sambhavāt iti arthaḥ
rāja nārāyaṇam lakṣmīḥ tvām āliṅgati nirbharam

original: atra yoṣita āliṅganaṃ nāyakasya sādṛśye nocitamiti lakṣmyāliṅganasya rājanyāsaṃbhavādupamābādhakam,
analyzed: atra yoṣitaḥ āliṅganam nāyakasya sādṛśye na ucitam iti lakṣmī āliṅganasya rājanya asaṃbhavāt upamā bādhakam
nārāyaṇe saṃbhavāt rūpakam
vijña priyā
ca rūpaka sādhakam āha rāja nārāyaṇam iti
lakṣmīḥ atra nārāyaṇasya patnī na tu sampad
atas āha yoṣitaḥ iti
nārāyaṇe ca sambhavāt rūpakam iti
rūpake nārāyaṇasya eva viśeṣya tvāt tatra eva āliṅgana anvayāt
evam
vadana ambuja meṇa akṣyā bhāti cañcala locanam
atra vadane locanasya sambhavāt upamāyāḥ sādhaka tā
ambuje ca asaṃbhavāt rūpakasya bādhaka tā
vijña priyā
vi chaḥ upamāyāḥ sādhakam āha vadana ambujam iti

original: cañcalaṃ locanaṃ yatreti vigraheṇa cañcalalocanavattvasyāmbujatulye vadane eva sambhavādupamāyāḥ sādhakatetyāha--atreti /
analyzed: cañcalam locanam yatra iti vigraheṇa cañcala locanavat tvasya ambuja tulye vadane eva sambhavāt upamāyāḥ sādhaka tā iti āha atra iti

original: evaṃ--“sundaraṃ vadanāmbujam” ityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge “upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge” iti vacanādupamāsamāso na saṃbhavatītyupamāyā  #
analyzed: evam sundaram vadana ambujam ityādau sādhāraṇa dharma prayoge upamitam vyāghra ādibhiḥ sāmānya aprayoge iti vacanāt upamā samāsaḥ na saṃbhavati iti upamāyāḥ
bādhakaḥ
evam ca atra mayūra vyaṃsaka ādi tvāt rūpaka samāsaḥ eva
vijña priyā
vi jaḥ evam anuśāsanena api yatra upamā samāsaḥ niṣiddhaḥ tatra apa na upamati āha evam iti

original: sundaraṃ vadanāmbujamityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge upamāsamāso na sambhavatītyatra upamāyā bādhaka ityanvayaḥ /
analyzed: sundaram vadana ambujam ityādau sādhāraṇa dharma prayoge upamā samāsaḥ na sambhavati iti atra upamāyāḥ bādhakaḥ iti anvayaḥ
sa ca sundara tvam
tasya upamā bādhaka tā grāhaka pāṇini anuśāsanam darśayati upamitam iti
anena pāṇini sūtreṇa sādhāraṇa dharma aprayogaḥ eva puruṣa vyāghra ādi upamā samāsaḥ
evam bodhanāt sādhāraṇa dharma prayogaḥ eva tad samāsaḥ niṣiddhaḥ

original: atrahīti vacanāt sundaraṃ vahanāmbujamiti prayoge upamāsamāse sati na sambhavatītyataḥ sundaratvarūpasādhāraṇadharmāprayoge upamāyā bodha ityarthaḥ
analyzed: atrahi iti vacanāt sundaram vahana ambujam iti prayoge upamā samāse sati na sambhavati iti atas sundara tva rūpa sādhāraṇa dharma aprayoge upamāyāḥ bodhaḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu mayūra eva puruṣaḥ vyaṃsakaḥ vigata bhuja mūla

original: ityādyārthe vyaṃsakatvādibhāvād yatropamānasya pūrvanirdeśastatraiva mayūravyaṃsakaditvamupamānasya paranirdeśe tu netyarthaḥ /
analyzed: iti ādya arthe vyaṃsaka tva ādi bhāvāt yatra upamānasya pūrva nirdeśaḥ tatra eva mayūra vyaṃsaka ditvam upamānasya para nirdeśe tu na iti arthaḥ
eka āśraya anupraveśaḥ yathā mama

original: “kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣatkṣaṇamapi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: kaṭākṣeṇa api īṣat kṣaṇam api nirīkṣeta yadi sā tad ānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihita aśeṣa viṣayaḥ
sa romāñca udañcat kuca kalaśa nibhinna vasayaḥ parīrambha ārambhaḥ kaḥ iva bhavitā ambhoruha dṛśaḥ
vijña priyā
eka āśraya sthiti rūpāṇām alaṅkāraṇām saṅkaram āha kaṭākṣeṇa iti
eka āśrayaḥ ca kvacid ekam vākyam kvacid ekam padam
na ca eka vākya stha tve saṃsṛṣṭiḥ evā iti vācyam
aṅga aṅgi bhāve a tathātvāt
na ca tadā aṅga aṅgi bhāva saṅkaraḥ iti vācyam
tadā api eka āśraya anupraveśa anapāyāt
kaṭākṣeṇa iti

original: sā nāyikā kṣaṇamarthānmāmīṣadalpaṃ yadi nirīkṣeta tadā pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ sāndra ānandaḥ sphurati /
analyzed: sā nāyikā kṣaṇam arthān mām īṣat alpam yadi nirīkṣeta tadā pihita aśeṣa viṣayaḥ sāndraḥ ānandaḥ sphurati

original: tadā tasyā ambujākṣyāḥ parīrambhārambhaḥ ka iva bhavitā,
analyzed: tadā tasyāḥ ambuja akṣyāḥ parīrambha ārambhaḥ kaḥ iva bhavitā
kaṭākṣeṇa eva kṛtārthaḥ ham tad parirambham na upekṣe iti arthaḥ
yat vā kaṭākṣa pātanataḥ dhikataraḥ parirambha ārambhaḥ kā eva bhavitā
anirvacanīyaḥ eva bhavitā iti arthaḥ
kīdṛśaḥ parirambha ārambhaḥ

original: saromāñcābhyāmata evodañcadbhyāṃ kucakalaśābhyāṃ nirbhinnaṃ paribhraṣṭaṃ vasanaṃ yatra tādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: sa romāñcābhyām atas eva udañcadbhyām kuca kalaśābhyām nirbhinnam paribhraṣṭam vasanam yatra tādṛśaḥ
atra kaṭākṣeṇa api iṣat kṣaṇam api iti atra cheka anuprāsasya nirīkṣeta iti atra kṣakāram ādāya vṛtti anuprāsasya ca eka āśraye nupraveśaḥ
evam ca atra eva anuprasā artha āpatti alaṅkārayoḥ
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ña) atra vākyārūpaikāśrayasattvaṃ dvividhānuprāsayordarśayati---atreti chekātuprāso 'nekasya vyañjanasya svarūpataḥ sāmye sati tacchekānuprāsoktatvāt
analyzed: atra atra vākya arūpa eka āśraya sattvam dvividha anuprāsayoḥ darśayati atra iti nekasya vyañjanasya svarūpataḥ sāmye sati tad śeka anuprāsa ukta tvāt

original: saṃyuktānevarṇasya tu ānupūrvyasambhavāttādṛśe 'nekasya kṣakāramātrasya sakṛcchekānuprāsa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tu ānupūrvya sambhavāt tādṛśe na ekasya kṣakāra mātrasya sakṛt śeka anuprāsaḥ iti arthaḥ
tādṛśasya eva kṣakāra antara sāhityāt aneka dhātve vṛtti anuprāsaḥ iti āha nirīkṣā iti iti atra iti
anekasya asakṛt tve vṛtti anuprasasya ukta tvāt
eka āśraya anupraveśaḥ eka vākya praveśaḥ
evam ca kṣakāra dvaya ghaṭita cheka anuprāsena kṣakāra antara sāhitya vaśāt vṛtti anuprāsa jananāt aṅga aṅgibhāva saṅkaraḥ
pi atra asti iti atas samāsa eka pada arūpa āśraye saṅkīrṇam udāharati āpātataḥ tatra eva anuprāsa arthāpatti alaṅkārayoḥ eka āśraya anupraveśam
darśayati evam ca atra eva iti

original: kaṭākṣapātenāpi sāndrandasphuraṇād daṇḍāpūpikayā siddhe stanaparirambhe 'nirvacanīyānanda ityevamarthāpattyalaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kaṭākṣa pātena api sāndra anda sphuraṇāt daṇḍāpūpikayā siddhe stana parirambhe nirvacanīya ānandaḥ iti evam arthāpatti alaṅkāraḥ iti arthaḥ
yathā vā
saṃsāra dhvānta vidhvaṃsaḥ iti atra rūpaka anuprāsayoḥ

original: yathā vā--“kurabakāravakāraṇatāṃ yayuḥ” ityatra rabakā ravakā ityekaṃ bakāravakāra ityekamiti yamakayoḥ /
analyzed: yathā vākura bakārava kāraṇatām yayuḥ iti atra rabakāḥ ravakāḥ iti ekam bakāravakāraḥ iti ekam iti yamakayoḥ
vijña priyā
vi ṭa samāse eka pade ṅga aṅgibhāva saṅkara rahitam eka āśraya anupraveśa saṅkaram āha yathā vā iti
rūpaka anuprāsayoḥ iti
kaṃsa niṣūdane
kurubakāḥ ityādi
atra eka vākya gatam yamaka dvayam
na ca atra pūrva yamakena uttara yamaka nirvāhāt anugrāhya anugrāhaka tā saṅkaraḥ upi iti vācyam
kāraṇatām iti etadīya repha paryantasya uttara yamakasya pūrva yamakena api
evam kalaka lola kalola dṛśe

original: tyatrāpi lakalo lakalo kalola kalola iti yamakadvayam /
analyzed: tyatra api lakalaḥ lakalo kalola kalolaḥ iti yamaka dvayam
yathā vā
ahi naa paoa rasiesu diahesu
rahasa pasāria gīāṇam mā uravindāṇam
vijña priyā
vi ṭhaḥ upamā rūpakayoḥ api eka āśraya anupraveśam darśayati iti
abhinava payoda rasikeṣu pathika sāmājikeṣu divaseṣu
mahati prasārita gīta ānartitakam mayūra vṛndānām
iti saṃskṛtam

original: prasāritaṃ gītaṃ yatreti tādṛśaṃ mayūravṛndānāmānartitakaṃ nṛtyayuktaviśeṣaṇakeṣu divaseṣu mahati pūjyaṃ bhavati śobhate ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: prasāritam gītam yatra iti tādṛśam mayūra vṛndānām ānartitakam nṛtya yukta viśeṣaṇakeṣu divaseṣu mahati pūjyam bhavati śobhate iti arthaḥ
maha pūjāyām iti dhātuḥ
nṛtya ucitam divasa viśeṣaṇam āha abhinava iti

original: abhinavapayoda eva rasikā rasavanta eka nṛtyadarśanārthaṃ rasavanto yatra tādṛśeṣu /
analyzed: abhinava payode eva rasikāḥ rasavantaḥ nṛtya darśana artham rasavantaḥ yatra tādṛśeṣu

original: tathā pathikāḥ sāmājikā iva nṛtyādididṛkṣisamājapradhānānīva yatra tādṛśeṣu /
analyzed: tathā pathikāḥ sāmājikāḥ iva nṛtya ādi didṛkṣi samāja pradhānāni iva yatra tādṛśeṣu

original: atra rasikasāmājikānāṃ samājapradhānatulyānāṃ ca tṛtyadarśināmāśrayatvena divasānāṃ nṛtyasattārūpakaṃ vyaṅgyamavadheyam /
analyzed: atra rasika sāmājikānām samāja pradhāna tulyānām ca āśraya tvena divasānām nṛtya sattā rūpakam vyaṅgyam avadheyam
atra iti ekāśraye pathika śaya āmāyitā iti upamā
pathika sāmājikeṣu iti rūpakam praviṣṭam iti
vijña priyā
atra upamā rūpakayoḥ eka āśraya anupraveśam darśayati atra iti
pathikā śyāmāyitā yatra iti upamā iti arthaḥ
pathika māsājikeṣu iti atra eva divaseṣu vyaṅgya rūpakam darśayati
pathikāḥ sāmājikāḥ yeṣu iti
sāmājikāḥ eva yeṣu iti arthaḥ
praviṣṭam iti vyaṅgya sattā rūpakam iti arthaḥ
śrī candraśekhara mahā kavi candrasūnu śrī viśvanātha kavi rāja kṛtam prabandham

original: sāhityadarpaṇamamuṃ sudhiyo vilokya sāhityatattvamakhilaṃ sukhameva vitta // VisSd_10.99 //
analyzed: sāhitya darpaṇam amum sudhiyaḥ vilokya sāhitya tattvam akhilam sukham eva vitta
vijña priyā
vi ḍha śrī candra iti
atra mudhiyaḥ iti sambodhanam
kvacid kavyaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ
he sudhiyaḥ

original: śrīcandretyādikṛtamamuṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṃ pustakaṃ vilokya akhilaṃ sāhityatattvaṃ sukhameva sukhaviśiṣṭameva yathā syāttathā vitta jānītetyarthaḥ
analyzed: śrī candra ityādi kṛtam amum sāhityadarpaṇam pustakam vilokya akhilam sāhitya tattvam sukham eva sukha viśiṣṭam eva yathā syāt tathā vitta jānīta iti arthaḥ
locanā
lo ū śrī candraśekhara iti
mahā kavi candra iti atra candra śabdaḥ śreṣṭha arthaḥ
viśvanātha nāmā kavi rājaḥ yasya imām praśastim ācakṣate vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: “āḥ kiṃ kampamurīkaroṣi vasudhe dhūrardite vā bhava- drovindena tu nandamandirakṛtakrīḍāvatāreṇa te /
analyzed: āḥ kim kampa murīkaroṣi vasudhe dhūḥ ardite vā bhava drovindena tu nanda mandira kṛta krīḍā avatāreṇa te

original: vikhyātaḥ kavirājirāja iti yaḥ śrīviśvanāthaḥ kṛtī tasyākarṇya giraḥ śirāṃsi bhujagādhīśo dhunīte 'dhunā” //
analyzed: vikhyātaḥ kavi rājirājaḥ iti yaḥ śrī viśvanāthaḥ kṛtī tasya ākarṇya giraḥ śirāṃsi bhujaga adhīśaḥ dhunīte dhunā
tena kṛtam sāhityadarpaṇa ākhyam grantham avalokya iti sambandhaḥ
yāvat prasanna indu nibha ānanā śrīḥ nārāyaṇasya aṅgam alaṅkaroti

original: tāvanmanaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnāmeṣa prabandhaḥ prathito 'stu loke // VisSd_10.100 //
analyzed: tāvat manaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnām eṣa prabandhaḥ prathitaḥ stu loke
vijña priyā
vi na yāvat iti
prasanna indu nibha ānanā śrīḥ yāvat nārāyaṇasya aṅgam alaṅkaroti

original: tāvatkavīnāṃ manaḥ sammadayannayaṃ prabandho loke prathitostu ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tāvat kavīnām manaḥ sammadayan ayam prabandhaḥ loke prathitoḥ tu iti arthaḥ
locanā

original: (lo, ṛ) samprati granthasya samāptau svābhīṣṭapūrvakaṃ śubhāśaṃsanaṃ karoti--- yāvaditi /
analyzed: samprati granthasya samāptau sva abhīṣṭa pūrvakam śubha āśaṃsanam karoti yāvat iti

original: sammadayan samyak prīṇayan--- āstāmanantakṛtinā kṛta eṣa dhīre- ṇāsādya tātaśaraṇāmburuhaprasādam /
analyzed: sammadayan samyak prīṇayan āstām ananta kṛtinā kṛtaḥ eṣa tāta śaraṇa amburuha prasādam
iti ālaṅkārika cakravarti sāndhivigrahika mahāpātra śrī viśvanātha kavi rāja kṛte sāhityadarpaṇe daśamaḥ paricchedaḥ
vijña priyā
vi te iti ityādi

original: akhilabhāṣaiva vilāsinī nāyikā tasyāḥ bhujaṅgaḥ kāmukastadanuśīlakatvāt /
analyzed: akhila bhāṣā eva vilāsinī nāyikā tasyāḥ bhujaṅgaḥ kāmukaḥ tad anuśīlaka tvāt

original: iti maheśvaratarkālaṅkāraviracitāyāṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṭīkāyāṃ daśamaparicchedavivaraṇam suśliṣṭasaṃskṛtavaśena sukhādhirohā vaiṣamyadustarataraṅgavibhedadakṣā
analyzed: iti maheśvara tarkālaṅkāra viracitāyām sāhityadarpaṇa ṭīkāyām daśama pariccheda vivaraṇam su śliṣṭa saṃskṛta vaśena sukha adhirohā vaiṣamya dustara taraṅga vibheda dakṣā
sāhitya darpaṇa mahā arṇavam uttarītum ṭīkā iyam asti taraṇiḥ na bibhīta dhīrāḥ
darpaṇe pratibimbante padārthāḥ iti na adbhutam
citram mama etat vyākhyāne darpaṇaḥ pratibimbite
avadhāna kṛta āmodā ṭīkā iyam na avadhīryatām
dhīrāḥ kaṣāya tāmbūle svādyante hi kramāt rasāḥ
